author: aconway
msg: * cpp/src/broker/BrokerMessageMessage.h: Change reference from weak_ptr to
shared_ptr. Broker messages hold their reference.
* cpp/src/broker/Reference.cpp (close): clear messages array to break
shared_ptr cycle and avoid a leak.

author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS2-2232 - Class.forName does not use AxisService class loader

author: jonesde
msg: A few cleanups, nothing major and no real functionality changes
